title: tour: provide instructions for those who built the tour from source too
body:
Context: https://tour.golang.org/welcome/3

My understanding from @campoy is that the recommended way to run the tour locally is by executing:

``$GOPATH/bin/gotour``

after getting the tour if necessary:

``go get golang.org/x/tour/gotour``

If that's the case, than the instructions on this page should be updated to reflect the recommendation.
